# EML Condo Node at Savio

EML has purchased a condo node at Savio, the high-performance
computational cluster managed by the Berkeley Research Computing (BRC)
program. EML users may be able access to 2 compute nodes.

If you are interested in using this resource, please create an account
at [https://mybrc.brc.berkeley.edu/](https://mybrc.brc.berkeley.edu).
Once your account is created and you've signed the cluster user access
agreement, from the welcome page, click on "Join" next to 2. Create or
join a project. Look for co\_econ and click "Join" next to it. You will
receive notificaiton when your request has been approved.

Instructions on how to access the SAVIO cluster, hardware details,
filesystems, job scheduler all are available at this [user
guide](http://research-it.berkeley.edu/services/high-performance-computing/user-guide).
Instructions on how to submit jobs to your condo are also available on
this page.
